titles.title: Fountain Darter Captive Propagation Research Act of 1993
Fountain Darter Captive Propagation Research Act of 1993
To establish a fountain darter captive propagation research program.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries.

committee.name: House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Environment and Natural Resources.

committee.name: House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries
House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries

action.text: Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.

committee.name: House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries

calendar.text: Ordered to be Reported (Amended) by Voice Vote.

committee.name: House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries

action.text: Subcommittee on Environment and Natural Resources Discharged.
Mr. Studds moved to suspend the rules and pass the bill, as amended.
Considered under suspension of the rules.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate.

vote.text: On motion to suspend the rules and pass the bill, as amended Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

bill.summary: 11/20/1993--Passed House amended. Fountain Darter Captive Propagation Research Act of 1993 - Directs the Secretary of the Interior to establish a fountain darter captive propagation research program: (1) to be operated in a manner that is consistent with the San Marcos Recovery Plan for San Marcos River endangered and threatened species; and (2) carry out specified activities at the San Marcos National Fish Hatchery and Technology Center and at Texas A&M University. Authorizes appropriations.
